programme.title: The final flight of the SR-71 Blackbird
programme.short_synopsis: Public spending cuts, and the decommissioning of the SR-71 Blackbird.
programme.medium_synopsis: The final flight of the SR-71 Blackbird spy plane, the Russian capture of an American pilot in 1960 and the cuts in the American public spending budgets.
